CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION   
G10          	GREATER THAN 10 MILES            	10+                       
LS1          	LESS THAN 1 MILE                 	LS1                        
1           	1 MILE                           	1                          
10           	10 MILES                         	10                        
2            	2 MILES                          	2                          
3            	3 MILES                          	3                          
4            	4 MILES                          	4                          
5            	5 MILES                          	5                          
6            	6 MILES                          	6                         
7            	7 MILES                          	7                         
8            	8 MILES                          	8                          
9            	9 MILES                          	9                          
99999        	VISIBILITY CODE INVALID          	ERRROR MESSAGE
